original_text: And Solomon left all the vessels unweighed, because there were so many of them; the weight of the bronze was not ascertained.
korean_text: 기구가 심히 많으므로 솔로몬이 다 달아보지 아니하고 두었으니 그 놋 무게를 능히 측량할 수 없었더라

sentences.original_text: And Solomon left all the vessels unweighed
sentences.korean_translation: 솔로몬은 모든 그릇들의 무게를 재지 않았습니다

sentences.original_text: because there were so many of them
the weight of the bronze was not ascertained
